remarks.para: May be inoperative provided crew rest and supernumerary areas are not occupied.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Ensure the crew rest and supernumerary areas are not occupied.
Crew rest and supernumerary areas are not occupied.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "PASSENGER/SUPERNUMERARY OXYGEN SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
